translations: 郡；区（法国的行政区，arrondissement 的复数）

sentences.sentence: She came top in 11 of the 20 arrondissements of Paris, as well as in a large swathe of central and south-western France, and in many of the working-class banlieues.
sentences.translation: 她赢得了巴黎二十个县当中的十一个，而在法国中部与西南部的一大块地域中她也获胜，还获得许多郊区工薪阶层的支持。
